channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DOJ outlines 10 ‘wins’ under Trump, says agency restored after Biden era
item.description: Justice Department says it has restored integrity and equal justice, promising more enforcement actions in 2026 against threats to American safety.

item.title: Jack Smith Seeks Cover With Latest Claims Related to Biden-Era Arctic Frost Spying Scandal

item.title: Mamdani sworn in by AG James in private midnight ceremony
item.description: Socialist Zohran Mamdani sworn in as NYC mayor in midnight ceremony at abandoned subway station, symbolizing his vision for working-class New Yorkers.

Trump targets Minnesota fraud allegations, says ‘we’re going to get to the bottom of all those'
item.description: Trump rails against alleged $18 billion social services fraud in Minnesota, calling it a "giant scam" during Mar-a-Lago remarks on New Year's Eve.
